title: The Future is Democratic Architecture not Starchitecture: Vandkunsten Architects's Søren Nielsen
itunes:title: The Future is Democratic Architecture not Starchitecture: Vandkunsten Architects's Søren Nielsen
description: Vandkunsten Architects is a studio that was born in opposition to the existing paradigms in architecture back in 1971. They wanted to build for people with respect for the environment. Their approach has not changed since - yet it might be more relevant than ever? Learn more about why the future needs democratic architecture and why we should build less. Featuring architect, head of research and development and partner at Vandkunsten Architects, Søren Nielsen and host Michael Booth.

itunes:subtitle: Building Better Lives
itunes:author: Danish Architecture Center
